text.autoconfig.passage.title: Passage
text.autoconfig.passage.option.degradeBl: Enable block degradation for well-treaded paths in the world.
Allow player entities to degrade blocks through natural movement.
Allow non-player entities that are not controlled by a player to degrade blocks through natural movement.
text.autoconfig.passage.option.limitAuto: When enabled, non-player entities that are not controlled by a player can only degrade a block by one stage (e.g., grass -> dirt).
text.autoconfig.passage.option.blockResi: The rough number of steps required to degrade a block into its next stage.
The chance for a block that would have degraded to resist degradation instead.
The factor for increased resilience of subsequent stages of degradation.
text.autoconfig.passage.option.stationar: Ticks before a stationary entity can contribute another step on the same block. Set to 0 to disable pacing.
text.autoconfig.passage.option.playerSte: The factor by which player steps contribute to block degradation (in counted steps).
text.autoconfig.passage.option.mountedEn: The factor by which mounted entity steps (e.g. horses) contribute to block degradation (in counted steps).
text.autoconfig.passage.option.autonomou: The factor by which light autonomous entity steps (e.g. rabbits, foxes, chickens) contribute to block degradation (in counted steps).
The factor by which heavy autonomous entity steps (e.g. pigs, cows, zombies) contribute to block degradation (in counted steps).
text.autoconfig.passage.option.chunkStep: The time in ticks after which step counts in a chunk will decay.
The factor by which step counts in a chunk will be removed each decay interval.
text.autoconfig.passage.option.enableLog: Enable logging of data handling, stepping and block degradation events.
